text: I Remember Everything, Richard () is a 1966 Latvian World War II movie directed by Rolands Kalniņš and starring Eduards Pāvuls, Antra Liedskalniņa, Harijs Liepiņš, Pauls Butkēvičs, Uldis Pūcītis. ==Other websites== * * Akmens un šķembas on VHS - Gilde Film Studio * (in Latvian) Category:1966 war movies Category:Latvian movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set in Latvia
title: I Remember Everything, Richard
